front.title: Curve25519 and Curve448 for Transport Layer Security (TLS)

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of Curve25519 and Curve448 for ephemeral key exchange in the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram TLS (DTLS) protocols. It updates RFC 5246 (TLS 1.2) and RFC 4492 (Elliptic Curve Cryptography for TLS).
